title: Start
body:
<<move Aig StageLeft2>><<move Lee StageRight2>>
<<outfit Aig Casual>> 
<<outfit Lee Casual>> 
<<expression Aig Neutral>>
<<expression Lee Neutral>>
<<name Friendship Lee>> 
Aigburth, your singing has improved lately.
->Thanks!
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    <<expression Aig Happy>>
    Oh, thanks!
    <<name Friendship ...>>
    You beam with pride.
->I think it still needs work...
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    I think it still needs work.
    <<name Friendship Lee>>
    <<statUp Friendship Lee>>
    <<expression Lee Happy>>
    That's a good attitude to have.
    But just make sure not to work yourself too hard.
    <<expression Aig Happy>>
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    Right.
->Really?
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    <<expression Aig Happy>>
    Oh really?
    <<name Friendship Lee>>
    <<statDown Friendship Lee>>
    <<expression Lee Angry>>
    Don't fish for more compliments, Aiggy. It's not attractive.
<<name Friendship Lee>>
You're improving, but I think you've still got a ways to go before our debut.
We all do.
<<name Friendship Aig>>
<<expression Aig Neutral>>
R-right.  Yeah.
